name: Cleaner Moodle
description: Cleaned everything up. Recommended to be used with dan6erbonds moodle opitmiser. Otherwise logging in could get difficult. You can find it here: https://greasyfork.org/de/scripts/371412-moodle-optimizer.
additional_info: in beta at the time code is a complete mess, custom color schemes, a dark theme and a version with less removed objects will be added in the future. THIS IS IN A VERY UNSTABLE STATE I TAKE NO RESPONSIBILITY IF YOUR EXAM DIDN'T UPLOAD OR ANYTHING OF THE KIND. have fun
